About LumenTech

Building Software
Solutions

We specialize in engineering scalable software tailored for ambitious startups and visionary teams, focusing on delivering real business outcomes. Our team consists of top-tier developers, UI designers, and AI engineers with strong technical expertise and product thinking.

Our Mission

To engineer scalable software that delivers real business outcomes for ambitious startups and visionary teams. We excel in building high-impact digital platforms, moving products from MVPs to fully scalable SaaS solutions with our top-tier team of developers, architects, and designers.

Core Values

Quality Focus

We prioritize clean code, best practices, and thorough testing to deliver reliable solutions that stand the test of time.

Global Reach

As a distributed team, we bring diverse perspectives and work across time zones to serve clients worldwide.

Personal Touch

With a small team, every client gets direct access to our developers and personalized attention to their project.

Our Services

Comprehensive
Digital Solutions

We deliver cutting-edge technology solutions that drive innovation, efficiency, and growth for businesses of all sizes.

LumenTech

Full-Stack Product Development

Handling everything from backend architecture to frontend interfaces. We build complete, scalable products that deliver real business outcomes for startups and growing companies.

LumenTech

Cross-Platform Mobile Apps

Using Flutter and React Native to build apps that deploy across iOS and Android. We create engaging mobile experiences that work seamlessly across all devices.

LumenTech

Microservices & Event-Driven Systems

Designing future-proof architectures with Domain-Driven Design (DDD), message queues, and real-time pipelines. We build robust backend systems that power your applications with performance, security, and scalability.

LumenTech

Cloud-Native Infrastructure

Implementing CI/CD, Docker, serverless architectures, and scalable deployments on platforms like GCP, AWS, and Firebase. We help you choose the right cloud platform and optimize your infrastructure for maximum performance.

LumenTech

AI/ML and Automation

Integrating advanced AI features such as large language models (LLMs), chatbots, recommendation engines, retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) pipelines, and automation capabilities. We build intelligent systems that enhance your business processes.

LumenTech

Real-Time & Secure Workflows

Managing notifications, live collaboration tools, authentication, and authorization securely and effectively. We streamline your development workflow with automated CI/CD pipelines, containerization, and infrastructure management.
